page.title: 06HEALTH IN BROUGHTY FERRY
page.content: {CLINICS} There are two Clinics in Broughty Ferry. One is situated in the Balgillo Estate and the other lies adjacent to the main shopping area. {DOCTORS }The area is well provided with medical practices. {LIMB FITTING CENTRE }A Limb Fitting Centre is situated in Broughty Ferry and is used by patients from the East of Scotland. This Centre is an important unit in the Scottish Health System and has an excellent reputation. {ST. AIDAN'S PROJECT }The St. Aidan's Project was set up to help disabled people in the Region. Anton House caters for disabled and handicapped people. Armistead Home caters for children with mental and physical difficulties.
